马超博士：在 SLAS 2024 上开创 CAR T 细胞治疗的“白血病芯片” NewsMedical 采访马超博士纽约大学 Tandon 工程学院的研究助理教授，在 SLAS 2024 上发表演讲之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Dr-Chao-Ma-Pioneering-Leukemia-on-a-Chip-for-CAR-T-Cell-Therapy-at-SLAS-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Dr-Chao-Ma-Pioneering-Leukemia-on-a-Chip-for-CAR-T-Cell-Therapy-at-SLAS-2024.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a14d06af-3292-4ae8-900e-de14a1c4351c Mon, 29 Jan 2024 08:15:00 -0500 Dr. Chao Ma: Pioneering 'Leukemia-on-a-Chip' for CAR T Cell Therapy at SLAS 2024
科学家发现连接大脑习惯中心和运动学习区域的关键通路研究人员探索了小脑如何直接影响黑质致密部（SNc）中多巴胺的释放。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Scientists-discover-key-pathway-linking-brains-habit-center-and-motor-learning-region.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Scientists-discover-key-pathway-linking-brains-habit-center-and-motor-learning-region.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0888a5fd-3f5c-4922-8ffb-b94814bd0ec3 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:39:00 -0500 Scientists discover key pathway linking brain's habit center and motor learning region
终生接触音乐与老年人大脑健康状况改善相关埃克塞特大学专家发表的一项新研究表明，终生接触音乐与老年时大脑健康状况改善有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Lifetime-exposure-to-music-linked-with-better-brain-health-in-older-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Lifetime-exposure-to-music-linked-with-better-brain-health-in-older-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=033d088c-eee5-479a-9bb3-17de2600a6a8 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:31:25 -0500 Lifetime exposure to music associated with better brain health in older age

医院规模不是影响小儿心脏手术结果的唯一因素对美国各地儿科心脏手术中心的一项研究表明，就成功的手术而言，决定手术质量的不仅仅是手术规模。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Hospital-size-not-the-only-factor-in-pediatric-heart-surgery-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Hospital-size-not-the-only-factor-in-pediatric-heart-surgery-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb94a3c0-9758-4345-bbdb-064bd88d8f18 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:18:27 -0500 Hospital size not the only factor in pediatric heart surgery outcomes
尽管手术的长期生存率更高，但许多年轻患者仍选择 TAVR尽管国家指南建议对 65 岁以下患有严重主动脉瓣狭窄的患者进行外科主动脉瓣置换术 (SAVR)，但许多医院仍然选择对 60 岁以下的患者采用非手术方法，生存率可能较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Many-young-病人-选择-TAVR-尽管-better-long-term-survival-with-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Many-young-病人-选择-TAVR-尽管-better-long-term-survival-with-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e895ca0b-6a7a-4a1e-824c-e47d6a5fb38c Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:12:57 -0500 Many young patients choose TAVR despite better long-term survival with surgery

研究发现，在 NHS 筛查之外诊断出患有 DCIS 的女性乳腺癌死亡率将增加四倍研究人员将公众筛查期间未发现的导管原位癌 (DCIS) 与通过 NHS 乳腺筛查计划发现的侵袭性乳腺癌和死亡率风险进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Study-finds-women-with-DCIS-diagnosed-outside-NHS-screening-face-fourfold-increase-in-breast-cancer-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Study-finds-women-with-DCIS-diagnosed-outside-NHS-screening-face-fourfold-increase-in-breast-cancer-mortality.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6616d259-1177-47e2-8d68-f0eb332b869d Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:45:00 -0500 Study finds women with DCIS diagnosed outside NHS screening face fourfold increase in breast cancer mortality
记录显示，尽管成瘾危机促使其他连锁店撤退，但 Publix 阿片类药物的销量仍在增长2015 年 10 月，Teva Pharmaceuticals 的一名高管在发现 Publix Super Markets 杂货连锁店强效阿片类药物的订单存在“严重危险信号”后，于 2015 年 10 月对这家超市进行了举报。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Records-show-Publix-opioid-sales-grew-even-as-addiction-crisis-prompted-other-chainse28099-pullback.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Records-show-Publix-opioid-sales-grew-even-as-addiction-crisis-prompted-other-chainse28099-pullback.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9989bb59-19ca-4a7a-8acc-ffd46267994d Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:08:59 -0500 Records show Publix opioid sales grew even as addiction crisis prompted other chains’ pullback
